fuzzing_params.Constraints: 1 <= s.length <= 10^5, s consists only of lowercase English letters. 1 <= t <= 10^5

problem_info.title: 3335. Total Characters in String After Transformations I
test_examples: Example 1: Input: s = "abcyy", t = 2 Output: 7 Explanation: First Transformation (t = 1): 'a' becomes 'b', 'b' becomes 'c', 'c' becomes 'd', 'y' becomes 'z', 'y' becomes 'z'. String after the first transformation: "bcdzz". Second Transformation (t = 2): 'b' becomes 'c', 'c' becomes 'd', 'd' becomes 'e', 'z' becomes "ab", 'z' becomes "ab". String after the second transformation: "cdeabab". Final Length of the string: The string is "cdeabab", which has 7 characters.

Example 2: Input: s = "azbk", t = 1 Output: 5 Explanation: First Transformation (t = 1): 'a' becomes 'b', 'z' becomes "ab", 'b' becomes 'c', 'k' becomes 'l'. String after the first transformation: "babcl". Final Length of the string: The string is "babcl", which has 5 characters.
